SELECT sa.* FROM marketing_strategy_activity sa LEFT JOIN `user` u ON sa.create_user = u.id
LEFT JOIN marketing_strategy_seller_limit ssl ON sa.id = ssl.marketing_strategy_id
sa.del_flag = 0 and sa.status!=4
AND sa.type = #{request.type}
AND sa.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.strategyActivityName},'%')
AND sa.status = #{request.status}
AND sa.begin_time > (SELECT NOW()) AND sa.status = 1
AND sa.begin_time <= (SELECT NOW()) AND sa.end_time >= (SELECT NOW()) AND sa.status = 1
AND (sa.end_time <= (SELECT NOW()) OR sa.status != 1)
AND (sa.condition_seller_type = 1 OR ssl.eid = #{request.eid})
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.createUserName},'%')
AND u.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.createTel},'%')
AND sa.create_time >= #{request.startTime}
AND sa.create_time <= #{request.stopTime}
AND sa.strategy_type = #{request.strategyType}
AND sa.operating_remark LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.operatingRemark},'%')
ORDER BY sa.create_time DESC
